WorkItem.ClosedComment: Working on intended, read the help on the Optimizer (http://www.codeplex.com/Rawr/Wiki/View.aspx?title=GearOptimization) for further clarification of intended behavior.
WorkItem.Description:
I've been using v2.2.10 recently to optimize gear for my Prot-Paladin.
 
Though I've unchecked the boxes for reenchanting and regemming, the Optimizer still suggests me other enchants & gems than I currently have.
 
PS: Never saw that happen when in previous versions.
WorkItem.Summary: [ProtPaladin] Optimizer is reenchanting/regemming though it shouldn't

Comments.Message: The boxes in the optimizer are for *OVERRIDE* Reenchant/Regem. ie, they make it regem/reenchant, even when you tell it not to. If you don't want it to, you still need to tell it not to. See the help page on gear optimization.
Okay... I just double-checked and tried the same thing with v2.2.9... and I'm having the same issue. :-\
Check the help on gear optimization. Unless you're marking items with blue diamonds the override controls won't have any effect.
Short version: You need to select gems/enchants for optimization just like you select items.
